title: Eclipse Vert.x and Log4j 2 CVE-2021-44228
content: A recent [CVE-2021-44228](https://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2021-44228) has been disclosed that affects the Log4j 2 library. The Vert.x project can *optionally* use this library for logging but *does not ship* this library and therefore is not affected by this CVE.
